parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The condition that you want to use to filter consumer groups in the instance. If you leave this parameter empty, all consumer groups in the instance are queried.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance to which the consumer groups belong.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.
